entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Host: StartupTimeout can result in broken application state #106227
  • RISC-V NativeAOT port #106223
  • [LoongArch64/RiscV] Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106219
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Making ConfigurationKeyNameAttribute easier to use #97164
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration can't generate code correctly with a conflict classname #106230
  • `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx10v1+V512+X64.IsSupported` is not expanded and results in an infinite loop #105402
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'op2->TypeIs(TYP_I_IMPL)' during 'Morph - Global' #105618
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_GCStress=1 or =2 is broken #105428
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpLogging improvements #106228
  • JIT: `GetFfr` hw intrinsics are not modelled appropriately by value numbering #105944
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `loggingBuilder.AddProviderFilter` helpers #105602
    Future
  • Dotnet core Oracle 23c SSL connection not working on Linux environment and works on Windows #104840
  • WER handler is broken #103872
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ordering issue around ensuring static constructor execution #81151
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'IS_ALIGNED(addr, byteSize)' during 'Emit code' #105624
    9.0.0
  • Seg fault in Linq.Expression tests #105706
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix native libs selection in System.IO.Ports package #106231
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: limit phi-refinement to loop-invariant VNs #106229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace absolute labels with #define in assembly code #106225
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use .alt_entry/.private_extern on Apple platforms #106224
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `JsonElement.GetPropertyCount()` #106222
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106221
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106220
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • fix #105969 #106218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • make Select_LargeNumber_Succcess exclusive #105751
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • Add linux-musl-loongarch64 in rid graphs #106226
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Handle peeling cns + cns patterns more robustly #106190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile default value #106179
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Model GetFfr* with a special side effect and handle it in VN #105973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix WER handler on Windows #106217
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass FP struct fields at arbitrary offsets in ArgIterator and CallDescrWorker #105800
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Consume the existing instruction metadata when validating expected memory size #106090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop creating map of assembly refs to name for `Module` #106210
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #105939
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add `DebuggerHidden` to managed JitHelpers #106167
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Synthesize a valid ECMA-335 image for read/write metadata instead of providing a separate metadata reader #106164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2512804 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Small tunning for write-barrier on arm64 #106191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Teach middle-end liveness to DCE dead calls without sideeffects #106183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fix `gtNodeHasSideEffects` checking call arguments #106185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Implementation of SOSDacApi GetMethodDescName for cDAC #106169
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Simplify MethodDesc::GetLoaderModule #106212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [browser][AOT] disable jiterp for jitcall trampolines #106202
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove two outdated test inputs from regex match timeout tests #106174
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add checks for MOVPRFX sequencing (#105514) #106184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • [EventPipe] Block eventpipe delete provider for pending callbacks #106156
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Shuffle MethodTable flags #106182
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006

PullRequests

Created

  • Include LA64 in supported ILCompiler RIDs #42657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42656
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Revert "Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation" #42648
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Visual Studio did not auto fill complete after typing Property in VB.net #74701
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35209.61 #74708

Updated

  • Source Generators: Diagnostic issues with locations in Additional Files files do not appear in VS's error list #49531
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some small things with readme #74709
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove an enumerator allocation during scrolling #74710
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Add span type inference #74646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Modify ISyntaxTreeFactoryService.CreateSyntaxTree to take in an optional SourceText. #74707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Modify MergedNamespaceDeclaration.MakeChildren to to allocate less #74698
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • [WIP] Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #57268
  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes, json_middleware #57267
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #57266
  • .MapRazorComponents<App>().AddAdditionalAssemblies() not working when <Router> has @rendermode = InteractiveServer #57265
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #57262
  • Quarantine `VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues` and `EventCountersAndMetricsValues` #57259
  • Pass websocket closeEvent.code in `WebSocketTransport` onClose event to consumer via new error type WebSocketError #57258

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #57261
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, mvc, plaintext #57216
  • Perf improvement: caching #57245

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate PropertyInfo for AsParameters parameters #57264
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Quarantine Hosting VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues and EventCountersAndMetricsValues tests #57260
    area-hosting
  • [release/8.0] Add support for Chromium Snap cert trust #57257
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Add support for Chromium Snap cert trust #57256
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5bcb2d7` to `ff233bd` #57140
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [6.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57203
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • [8.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57182
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • Fix OpenAPI transformer lifetimes and disposal #57253
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add some comments to various internal HTTP/2 types #57151
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Pair to Mac really needs a timeout option, at least for the "Executing SayHello Task" #24131
  • webview Can I use Java to call C # code? #24133
  • MauiUIApplicationDelegate could not be found #24009
  • CollectionView rendering hangs the apps #23992
  • Border updates stroke too frequently #24123
    .NET 8 SR9
  • The App is not listed in app list of iPhone settings for the apps that is deployed with release mode in .net maui #24132
  • Multi-project template, lack of loaded projects after creation #24089
    .NET 8 SR9

Updated

  • Support direct use of Path's as the Source property in the ImageButton, Image, and Button controls #24084
  • [MAC-CATALYST] PressesCancelled getting triggered on every key press. #9281
    Backlog
  • MAUI Page transition animation background color #11955
    Backlog
  • Theming android native timepicker popup #24092
    Backlog
  • Trim warnings when publishing `dotnet new maui` for the first time #24062
    9.0-rc1
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #19689
    Backlog
  • Nested Entry View In A Frame Causes Crash #15196
    Backlog
  • [Android] App crash when using a binding value that exceeds Entry max length #23423
  • Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #15524
    Backlog
  • FlexLayout inside of an ScrollView doesn't scroll on iOS #10256
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] Cannot control unselected text color of tabs within TabbedPage #18775
    Backlog
  • CollectionView is not updating SelectedItems bound property #8435
    Backlog
  • CarouselView current item isn't changing #12113
    Backlog
  • Provide the equivalent of GetManifestResourceNames for MauiAsset files #10816
    Backlog
  • .net 8 CollectionView Group Add method issue #21791
    Backlog
  • Resolving Offset Errors in MAUI 8 Apps Post-Publisher Signing #24117
  • iOS animated border #24104
  • MAUI Blazor app: Stops working after connecting with bluetooth keyboard #23916
  • iOS application crashed on startup. Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia.dll incompatible with aot? #23788
  • ios Shell #22452
    Backlog
  • Custom selection styles for items in CollectionView are ignored when programmatically selecting an item #18933
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] App crash when text exceeds Entry MaxLength #24138
    community ✨
  • Add new Blazor Hybrid Solution template to CODEOWNERS #24137
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid Solution template #24136
    area-templates
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid template #24135
    area-templates
  • WIP: Add xUnit types to avoid first-chance exceptions in tests #24130
    area-testing

Merged

  • Remove instances of '#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER' #24126
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure border stroke only updates when needed #24125
    area-controls-border
  • Add shared project for multi-project template when generated in Visual Studio #24095
    area-templates

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • Always return Granted for Read-Write Storage permissions on Android #23909
    area-essentials
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • Correct "can not" to "cannot" in messages, comments, etc. #24124
    area-xaml

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQL Server: String parameters for JSON values have varying lengths #34396
  • JsonQueryCosmosTest fail against real Cosmos #34395
    MQ

PullRequests

Merged

    Servicing-approved, 8.0.9

Updated
